DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Venlafaxine-referenced study evaluate efficacy , safety tolerability two fixed dos Vortioxetine acute treatment Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Randomised Placebo-controlled Venlafaxine-referenced Study Efficacy Safety 5 10 mg Vortioxetine ( Lu AA21004 ) Acute Treatment Major Depressive Disorder Adults
DOC.criteria: MDE primary diagnosis accord DSMIVTR criterion ( classification code 296.xx ) Current MDE duration least 3 month le 12 month The patient MADRS total score > =30 Any current psychiatric disorder MDD define DSMIV TR Any substance disorder within previous 6 month Female patient childbearing potential use effective contraception Use psychoactive medication 2 week prior screen study Other protocoldefined inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
